update.description:
The ign-transport3 windows build has been failing because the pathname for some build artifacts is too long:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-windows7-amd64/7/

~~~
CMake Warning in test/integration/CMakeLists.txt:
  The object file directory

    D:/Jenkins/workspace/ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-windows7-amd64/workspace/ign-transport/build/test/integration/CMakeFiles/INTEGRATION_twoProcessesSrvCallWithoutInputReplierIncreasing_aux.dir/

  has 200 characters.  The maximum full path to an object file is 250
  characters (see CMAKE_OBJECT_PATH_MAX).  Object file

    twoProcessesSrvCallWithoutInputReplierIncreasing_aux.cc.obj

  cannot be safely placed under this directory.  The build may not work
  correctly.
~~~

~~~
D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-windows7-amd64\workspace\ign-transport\test\integration\twoProcessesSrvCallWithoutOutputReplierIncreasing_aux.cc
 : fatal error C1083: Cannot open compiler generated file:
 'CMakeFiles\INTEGRATION_twoProcessesSrvCallWithoutOutputReplierIncreasing_aux.dir\twoProcessesSrvCallWithoutOutputReplierIncreasing_aux.cc.obj':
 No such file or directory
~~~

but it's just barely too long because this test compiles on the `pr_any` and `default` jobs. The fact that the `ign-transport3` job has a longer name causes it to fail.

Since it's so close, I'm reducing the path length by renaming a local workspace folder from `workspace` to `ws`. It must be done simultaneously in multiple batch files since several of them call `project-default-devel-windows.bat`.

Testing:

* :blue_circle: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-windows7-amd64/12/
* :blue_circle: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat5-windows7-amd64/37/
* :yellow_heart: (one unrelated warning) https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/ignition_math-ci-ign-math3-windows7-amd64/5
* :blue_circle: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/ignition_rndf-ci-default-windows7-amd64/44
* :yellow_heart: (expected compiler warnings) https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo8-windows7-amd64/129
update.title: use shorter workspace path on windows to fix ign-transport3
